attributes.action: Repeal the handgun ban of 1997 as it has not affected  the use of ILLEGAL firearms but has denied thousands of legitimate F.A.C. holders from following their sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This legislation was used as a vote gathering exercise and in no way did it affect the use of illegal firearms in this country. The Governments own figures support this view as the increase year on year has shown. Please Mr. Blair, stand up like a man and admit that you made a mistake.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
